name: Ampharos
description: The tail’s tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.

attacks.name: Acceleration Bolt
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Ampharos does 20 damage to itself.
